attributes.action: maintain the availability of incandescent bulbs for people who cannot tolerate low-energy lighting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A ban will cause huge suffering among people with a wide range of health conditions who suffer severe and painful reactions to fluorescent lighting including low-energy bulbs. These health conditions include lupus, ME, forms of eczema, porphyria, XP, electrosensitivity and many more. LED technology is still under development and has not been tested by vulnerable groups. Individuals who have tried it have had bad reactions.Don't let Brussels inflict torture and misery on sick and disabled people.
